entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
